metadata.name: 30-50 Feral Hogs #1
metadata.description: 3250 (read as: 30 to 50) Feral Hogs invading yards on the Ethereum blockchain as ERC-721A NFTs. Every hog represents membership in the Feral Hog Yard Club; along with all of the Metaverse, Web3, and  IRL benefits that entails, along with access to 'The Yard'.
